metadata.name: Activity Status
metadata.description: Lifecycle status of the activity from pipeline to completion

1.name: Pipeline/identification
1.description: The activity is being scoped or planned

2.name: Implementation
2.description: The activity is currently being implemented

3.name: Finalisation
3.description: Physical activity is complete or the final disbursement has been made, but the activity remains open pending financial sign off or M&E

4.name: Closed
4.description: Physical activity is complete or the final disbursement has been made.

6.name: Suspended
6.description: The activity has been temporarily suspended
